justification: “Among the diversity of cognitive processes involved in sporting performance, we decided to focus on decision-making and executive control through the Simon task achievement.”
“We also decided to assess overall central nervous system arousal through a visual sensory-discrimination task called critical flicker fusion task (CFF).”
“The participant's perceived exertion (RPE) was assessed using a visual analogue scale since it has shown a good reproducibility and sensitivity to assess the perceived exertion during exercise.”
“The impulsivity level was evaluated by the Error Location Index (ELI), which measures the proportion of fast errors that are located among the fastest trials.”
“Finally, inhibition ability was evaluated by the Interference Dynamics Index (IDI), which measures the concentration of the interference effect among the fastest trials.”
